52_005_000.Text: Be Prepared For the Return of the Lord Jesus

Token.Text: Be Prepared For the Return of the Lord Jesus

52_005_001.Text: Brothers and sisters, I don’t think it is necessary to write to you about when the Lord Jesus Christ will return to this world.

Token.Text: Brothers and sisters, I don’t think it is necessary to write to you about when the Lord Jesus Christ will return to this world.

52_005_002.Text: For you know very well that the Lord will return when you have not even thought about it.

Token.Text: For you know very well that the Lord will return when you have not even thought about it.

52_005_002.Text: when you have not even thought about it

Token.Text: when you have not even thought about it

52_005_002.Text: In Greek, “like a thief at night”. See, Revelation 3:3, 16:15; Matthew 24:42-44; 2 Peter 3:10. This is also in verses 4-5.

Token.Text: In Greek, “like a thief at night”. See, Revelation 3:3, 16:15; Matthew 24:42-44; 2 Peter 3:10. This is also in verses 4-5.

52_005_003.Text: Those who are in the dark kingdom of Satan will then say, “Now there is peace all around, and there is nothing to fear...”

Token.Text: Those who are in the dark kingdom of Satan will then say, “Now there is peace all around, and there is nothing to fear...”

52_005_003.Text: But what will really happen is that just as a pregnant woman feels the pain of childbirth in an instant, disaster will come upon them at once, and they will have nowhere to go.

Token.Text: But what will really happen is that just as a pregnant woman feels the pain of childbirth in an instant, disaster will come upon them at once, and they will have nowhere to go.

52_005_004-005.Text: But brothers and sisters, you and I are neither of the ‘darkness’ nor of the ‘night’ like them. You belong to God’s ‘light’ and to the ‘day’. And for you, the return of the Lord will not be alarming or come as a surprise.

Token.Text: But brothers and sisters, you and I are neither of the ‘darkness’ nor of the ‘night’ like them. You belong to God’s ‘light’ and to the ‘day’. And for you, the return of the Lord will not be alarming or come as a surprise.

52_005_006-007.Text: For ‘Night’ is when people drink and get drunk and sleep away their lives. So let us not sleep away our lives like them, but rather be vigilant and sober.

Token.Text: For ‘Night’ is when people drink and get drunk and sleep away their lives. So let us not sleep away our lives like them, but rather be vigilant and sober.

52_005_008.Text: Since we are of the ‘day’, let us strap on our weapons and armor and be alert: such as the ‘helmet’

Token.Text: Since we are of the ‘day’, let us strap on our weapons and armor and be alert: such as the ‘helmet’
‘helmet’
Eph 6:17

52_005_008.Text: of our full faith in salvation, and let us put on the ‘breastplate’

Token.Text: of our full faith in salvation, and let us put on the ‘breastplate’
‘breastplate’

52_005_008.Text: of our faith in and love for Christ.

Token.Text: of our faith in and love for Christ.

52_005_009.Text: You see, God did not choose us to punish us, but rather to save us through the sacrifice of the Lord Jesus Christ.

Token.Text: You see, God did not choose us to punish us, but rather to save us through the sacrifice of the Lord Jesus Christ.

52_005_010.Text: Jesus Christ gave His life for us, so that when He returns, whether we are alive or dead, He will take us to heaven to live with Him there forever and ever.

Token.Text: Jesus Christ gave His life for us, so that when He returns, whether we are alive or dead, He will take us to heaven to live with Him there forever and ever.

52_005_011.Text: Therefore, continue to encourage one another, and help each other grow in spiritual maturity, just as you have been doing.

Token.Text: Therefore, continue to encourage one another, and help each other grow in spiritual maturity, just as you have been doing.
Final Warning and Greetings

52_005_012.Text: Brothers and sisters, we ask you to honor the leaders of the Church of the Lord Jesus,

Token.Text: Brothers and sisters, we ask you to honor the leaders of the Church of the Lord Jesus,
honor those leaders
Hebrews 13:7-17

52_005_012.Text: who help you grow spiritually. They give their life and limb to guide you.

Token.Text: who help you grow spiritually. They give their life and limb to guide you.

52_005_013-014.Text: Because of their very hard work among you, give them plenty of love and honor.

Token.Text: Because of their very hard work among you, give them plenty of love and honor.

52_005_013-014.Text: My brothers and sisters, this also is our request to you that, in the group among yourselves, remain reconciled with one another. Those among you who are fallen into inactivity, explain to them to do hard.work to earn their daily needs. Increase the courage of those who are afraid. Those who are lacking knowledge,

Token.Text: My brothers and sisters, this also is our request to you that, in the group among yourselves, remain reconciled with one another. Those among you who are fallen into inactivity, explain to them to do hard.work to earn their daily needs. Increase the courage of those who are afraid. Those who are lacking knowledge,
lacking knowledge

52_005_013-014.Text: In the Greek language, “weak”. See Rom 14:1.

Token.Text: In the Greek language, “weak”. See Rom 14:1.

52_005_013-014.Text: help them. Keep on looking after everyone with patience.

Token.Text: help them. Keep on looking after everyone with patience.

52_005_015.Text: Be careful! No one among you should take revenge for evil. But in every situation, always look for ways to do good, not only to those within the Church, but also to outsiders.

Token.Text: Be careful! No one among you should take revenge for evil. But in every situation, always look for ways to do good, not only to those within the Church, but also to outsiders.
Always be happy.
Always keep praying.

52_005_018.Text: No matter what happens, always give thank to God. This is God’s will for you as a believer in Christ Jesus.

Token.Text: No matter what happens, always give thank to God. This is God’s will for you as a believer in Christ Jesus.

52_005_019.Text: Let God’s Holy Spirit work in you.

Token.Text: Let God’s Holy Spirit work in you.
Don’t ignore prophecies.

52_005_021.Text: But test them and all things first. If they are scripturally correct, accept them.

Token.Text: But test them and all things first. If they are scripturally correct, accept them.

52_005_022.Text: And stay away from all evil.

Token.Text: And stay away from all evil.

52_005_023.Text: May the peace-giving God Himself sanctify everything in your life holy, so that you may be completely blameless

Token.Text: May the peace-giving God Himself sanctify everything in your life holy, so that you may be completely blameless
completely

52_005_023.Text: In the Greek language, “whole spirit, soul, and body.”

Token.Text: In the Greek language, “whole spirit, soul, and body.”

52_005_023.Text: at the return of the Lord Jesus Christ.

Token.Text: at the return of the Lord Jesus Christ.

52_005_024.Text: And look, the God who has chosen you is faithful, and He will surely do this.

Token.Text: And look, the God who has chosen you is faithful, and He will surely do this.

52_005_025.Text: Brothers and sisters, continue to pray for us also.

Token.Text: Brothers and sisters, continue to pray for us also.
Embrace and greet each other.

52_005_027.Text: Before the Lord Jesus read this letter aloud to all the believers in the church there.

Token.Text: Before the Lord Jesus read this letter aloud to all the believers in the church there.

52_005_028.Text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

Token.Text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
